bill.title: Child Support Enforcement
bill.description: Includes the date that services for remuneration were first performed as information to be provided to the Child Support Enforcement Agency through the new hire reporting process. Establishes notice and time limit requirements for employers or unions in receipt of notice regarding health insurance for a dependent child. (HB2441 HD2)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to HUS, JUD, referral sheet 7
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by HUS on Thursday, 02-09-12 8:30AM in House conference room 329.

(H) The committees on HUS recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Mizuno, Jordan, Belatti, Hanohano, Morikawa, Yamane, Pine; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) C. Lee, Wooley, Ching.
(H) Reported from HUS (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 416-12) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Belatti, C. Lee, M. Lee, Tokioka excused (4).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Tuesday, 02-21-12 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) Keith-Agaran, Rhoads, Brower, Cabanilla, Carroll, Coffman, Herkes, Ito, Luke, McKelvey, Souki, Tsuji, Fontaine, Marumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Thielen.
(H) Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 700-12) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-06-12.
(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 209).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to JDL.
(S) The committee(s) on JDL has scheduled a public hearing on 03-28-12 10:00AM in conference room 016.

(S) The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in JDL were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Hee, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Ihara.
(S) Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3190) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading.
(S) One Day Notice 04-10-12.
(S) Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 496).
(H) Transmitted to Governor.
